// 
// EditCustomerCreditCard
// https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx?WSDL
// 
// Method source code automatically generated by the 4D SOAP wizard.
// ----------------------------------------------------------------

C_TEXT($1)
C_TEXT($2)
C_TEXT($3)
C_TEXT($4)
C_TEXT($5)
C_TEXT($6)
C_TEXT($7)
C_TEXT($8)
C_TEXT($9)
C_TEXT($10)
C_BOOLEAN($11)//True - display Alerts
C_TEXT($0)
C_LONGINT($EziResult)

C_TEXT($root)
C_TEXT($subelem)
C_TEXT($namespace)

$oldErrMethod:=Method called on error

ON ERR CALL("ERR_Ezi")

$namespace:="https://px.ezidebit.com.au/"
$root:=DOM Create XML Ref("EditCustomerCreditCard";$namespace)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/DigitalKey")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$1)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/EziDebitCustomerID")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$2)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/YourSystemReference")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$3)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/NameOnCreditCard")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$4)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/CreditCardNumber")
//DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$5)
//////fb10840////////////
If (Length($5)>Length(CrLfRemove ($5)))
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;CrLfRemove ($5))
SyncRecordLog ("Cr/Lf removed from CreditCardNumber")
Else 
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$5)
End if 


$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/CreditCardExpiryYear")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$6)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/CreditCardExpiryMonth")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$7)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/CreditCardCCVNumber")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$8)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/Reactivate")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$9)

$subelem:=DOM Create XML element($root;"/EditCustomerCreditCard/Username")
DOM SET XML ELEMENT VALUE($subelem;$10)

WEB SERVICE SET PARAMETER("XMLIn";$root)

DOM EXPORT TO VAR($root;$Message)
//SET TEXT TO PASTEBOARD($Message)
//SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit EditCustomerCreditCard Request: "+$Message)
SyncRecordLog ("Highlander: "+String([Facility]Highlander))
MaskCCLog ($Message;"WSC_EziEditCustomerCreditCard")

If ([Facility]Highlander)
If ([Facility]TestAccount)//If ($1="33502BC5-35AC-4EC0-8579-BB297393022E")
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.demo.ezidebit.com.au/v3-5/pci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/IPCIService/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)

Else 
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://live.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.ezidebit.com.au/v3-5/pci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/IPCIService/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)

End if 
Else 
If ([Facility]TestAccount)//If ($1="33502BC5-35AC-4EC0-8579-BB297393022E")
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://test.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.demo.ezidebit.com.au/v3-3/pci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/IPCIService/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)

Else 
//WEB SERVICE CALL("https://live.paymentxchange.com.au/PaymentExchange.asmx";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service Manual)
WEB SERVICE CALL("https://api.ezidebit.com.au/v3-3/pci";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/IPCIService/EditCustomerCreditCard";"EditCustomerCreditCard";"https://px.ezidebit.com.au/";Web Service manual)

End if 
End if 

$EziResult:=Num(WEB SERVICE Get info(0))

If ($EziResult=0)
C_BLOB($blob)
C_TEXT($resroot)
C_TEXT($ressubelem)
WEB SERVICE GET RESULT($blob;"XMLOut";*)
$resroot:=DOM Parse XML variable($blob)

DOM EXPORT TO VAR($resroot;$Message)
//SET TEXT TO PASTEBOARD($Message)
SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit EditCustomerCreditCard Response: "+$Message)

$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/EditCustomerCreditCardResponse/EditCustomerCreditCardResult/Error")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;$0)

If ($0="0")
$0:="S"
Else 
$ErrorMessage:=""
$ressubelem:=DOM Find XML element($resroot;"/EditCustomerCreditCardResponse/EditCustomerCreditCardResult/ErrorMessage")
DOM GET XML ELEMENT VALUE($ressubelem;$ErrorMessage)
$0:="ERR"+$0
If ($11) & (Not(IsAWebProcess ))
AlertMessage ($ErrorMessage)
$0:="ERROR"
End if 
End if 

DOM CLOSE XML($resroot)

Else 
SyncRecordLog ("EziDebit EditCustomerCreditCard call result: "+String($EziResult)+" Message: "+gError)
If ($11) & (Not(IsAWebProcess ))
AlertMessage ("EziDebit call result, error code: "+String($EziResult)+" (Unable to process update)")
//AlertMessage (gError)
End if 
$0:="ERROR"
End if 

DOM CLOSE XML($root)
ON ERR CALL($oldErrMethod)
